title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 433.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 433.1 - Scope

State Regulations

This Part establishes standards for the protection of
persons with special needs pursuant to article 11 of the Social Services Law. Section
488
of the

Social Services Law defines a vulnerable person as a person who, due to
physical or cognitive disabilities, or the need for services or placement, is
receiving services from a facility or provider agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
433.1

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
